1.text: Understand how the closing mechanism works.

2.text: Know that some bras attach in the front.

3.text: Place one hand on the end of each strap.

4.text: Push both sides in towards one another to relieve the tension on the connectors.

6.text: Place your fingers on one side of the clasps and your thumb on the other.

9.text: Put your arms behind your back, reaching from the bottom up.

10.text: Push both straps in towards one another like they are kissing.

11.text: Slide the strap with the hooks outwards.

13.text: Place one hand on each side of the clasp.

14.text: Pull one side of the clasp up and the other side down.
